CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in New Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, September 9, 1967, pg. 4, reads: "Sisters Like Pittsburgh - These New Orleans Sisters of the Holy Family recently came to Pittsburgh to teach. Sister Mary Norbert, Sister Shelia Marie, Sister Beatrice, and Sister Mary Aquinta will be teaching in Elizabeth Seaton school in Brookline, and the others will teach at St. Stephens Catholic School in Hazelwood.  The Nuns are from the Sisters of Charity who operate the schools. Far right is Mrs. Annie Peterson who pointed out the various beauty spots in the city. - Harris photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of nuns, including Sister Mary Norbert, Sister Shelia Marie, Sister Beatrice, and Sister Mary Aquinta, and Annie Peterson standing on right, for Labor Day celebration honoring Randolph, next to Civic Arena
